title: Behind the Scenes Minis: Morandi and Kemmler
itunes:title: Behind the Scenes Minis: Morandi and Kemmler
description:
Tracy and Holly discuss the ways in which the sexes were perceived during the time of Anna Morandi Manzolini and the aspects of Kemmler's story that made Holly very angry during research.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
